LanguageData.FarmConstructionSpeed.label: farming speed
LanguageData.FarmConstructionSpeed.description: The speed at which this person fertilizes and tills soil.
LanguageData.FarmConstructSuccessChance.label: farming success chance
LanguageData.FarmConstructSuccessChance.description: The chance that this person will succeed in fertilizing or tilling soil.\nFailing means wasting time and resources.
